DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare clinical performance somfilcon A , nelfilcon A II 2 omafilcon A II 2 daily disposable contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Comparison Three Soft Daily Disposable Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: This randomise , subject-masked , crossover , bilateral study , control cross comparison . Fifty subject use lens type week random sequence . Follow-up visit lens perform one week wear . Lenses worn daily wear , daily disposable wear schedule .
DOC.criteria: Subjects eligible study : 1 . They legal age ( 18 ) capacity volunteer . 2 . They understand right research subject willing able sign Statement Informed Consent . 3 . They willing able follow protocol . 4 . They agree participate clinical research duration study . 5 . They contact lens spherical prescription 1.00 6.00D ( Diopters ) ( inclusive ) 6 . They spectacle cylindrical correction 0.75D less eye . 7 . At dispense , attain least 0.10 logMAR distance high contrast visual acuity eye study lens within available power range . 8 . They currently use soft contact lenses do previous six month . 9 . They willing comply wear schedule ( least five day per week least eight hour per day ) . Subjects eligible take part study : 1 . They ocular disorder would normally contraindicate contact lens wear . 2 . They systemic disorder would normally contraindicate contact lens wear . 3 . They use topical medication eye drop ointment . 4 . They cataract surgery . 5 . They corneal refractive surgery . 6 . They corneal distortion result previous hard rigid lens wear keratoconus . 7 . They pregnant breastfeed . 8 . They ocular abnormality would , opinion investigator , normally contraindicate contact lens wear . 9 . They infectious disease would , opinion investigator , contraindicate contact lens wear pose risk study personnel ; immunosuppressive disease ( e.g . HIV ) , history anaphylaxis severe allergic reaction . 10 . They take part contact lens care solution clinical trial research , within two week prior start study .
